item.title: The Partisan Chaos Unfolding in Minnesota
item.description: Democrats are scuffling to control two houses of the state legislature — with a majority in neither.

item.title: The Winter Show at the Park Avenue Armory: Quality Abounds, and Firepower, Too
item.description: A 1776 Kentucky rifle, a rare Grant Wood painting, and Tiffany’s Poppy Lamp are among the treasures to be purchased.

item.title: Birthright Citizenship Isn’t Going Away Just Because Trump Said So
item.description: It would probably take a constitutional amendment — or, at a minimum, congressional legislation.
